Domain

class src.domain.ingestion.IngestionSource[source]

Abstract interface for any pull-based ingestion source. Implementations should list items within the given scope and return Document objects. Ingestion should be incremental, resumable, and traceable.

abstractmethod list_documents(scope)[source]

Return a list of identifiers/paths for all documents in the scope.

Parameters:

scope (IndexingScope)

Return type:

List[str]

abstractmethod read_document(doc_id)[source]

Given a document identifier, read and return the Document object.

Parameters:

doc_id (str)

Return type:

Document

abstractmethod supports_resume()[source]

Return True if this source can support incremental/resumable ingestion.

Return type:

bool

class src.domain.vector_store.VectorStore[source]

Abstract interface for storing embeddings and associated metadata. Supports storing vectors, querying by vector similarity, and incremental updates.

abstractmethod add_vectors(chunks, vectors)[source]

Add chunks and their embeddings to the vector store.

Parameters:

  • chunks (List[Chunk])

  • vectors (List[List[float]])

Return type:

None

abstractmethod query(vector, top_k=10)[source]

Return top_k chunks most similar to the given vector, with similarity scores.

Parameters:

  • vector (List[float])

  • top_k (int)

Return type:

List[Tuple[Chunk, float]]

abstractmethod remove_chunks(chunk_ids)[source]

Remove chunks by ID from the store.

Parameters:

chunk_ids (List[str])

Return type:

None

abstractmethod clear()[source]

Clear all vectors from the store.

Return type:

None

abstractmethod dimension()[source]

Return the embedding dimensionality the store expects.

Return type:

int
